summary: All 4 Round 1 issues (M1-M4) properly addressed. No new maintainability issues found. CONVERGED.

M1.assessment: Race condition explanation now includes timing window, expectation under concurrent runs, and ON CONFLICT behavior. Clear for future maintainers.

M2.assessment: Docstring now includes Issue #176 warning about intentionally returning graduated orphans. Explicitly warns against adding NULL filter.

M3.assessment: Cross-reference to OrphanMatcher with specific line numbers (271-319) and instruction to update BOTH if routing logic changes.

M4.assessment: Expanded comment explains UNIQUE constraint on signature row, EvidenceService routing, and distinguishes from stories_graduated.
